name: Peril (Darvos)
description:
CONTROLS:

A=Left | D=Right | SpaceBar=Jump | E=Sword Slash | Q=Javelin

Controller supported

Peril is an action adventure 2d platformer created using Unreal Engine 4. In this game the main character must battle through various worlds and defeat many enemies, all the while using a javelin as both a weapon and a tool to reach  new places.  This is only the demo version. The full game is still being developed and will consist of seven unique worlds. 
I am building this game independently.  All the assets in the game have been purchased (from itch.io) and I would like to thank and give credit to:
